Program_Title: KFMB Reps Bilbray Hunter and Issa Sponsor War Memorial Protection Act

Headlines: San Diego Congressmen Bilbray, Hunter, and Issa Sponsor "War Memorial Protection Act" that would allow religious symbols to be a part of military monuments, such as Mt. Soledad.
